title: Sayakaaja
author: Sayakaaja
content: Recently, I have been watching religious films a lot, which in the films always contain touching messages and motivations. and now I need religious film recommendations from you..

comments.author: Ucy
comments.created_time: December 12, 2022, 05:33:39 PMLast edit: December 12, 2022, 06:01:17 PM by Ucy
comments.body: Quote from: Sayakaaja on December 12, 2022, 01:42:08 PMRecently, I have been watching religious films a lot, which in the films always contain touching messages and motivations. and now I need religious film recommendations from you..I don't know of any unfortunately. But I will recommend listening to any full Audio of Christian Holy Bible. Listen to the audios almost feel like listening to movies/films.Audio Bible YouTube Playlist:https://m.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLIxhnx0kb33ORn8RQgHH54rdJMmqaRfmdOne of my favorite in the Playlist that feels so much like movie is Acts (Book 44)

comments.author: BitcoinBarrel
comments.body: I found David and Bathsheba (1951) while looking for films to watch. I haven't seen it yet but it looks good.Here is the full movie free on YouTube:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a4koUXy2Xtk

comments.author: Tallupooh
comments.body: teach me islam, verses of love. that's just a recommendation from me, hope this can help you.

comments.author: Sayakaaja
comments.body: thanks for all the recommendations from all of you

comments.body: Muhammad: The Messenger of God https://g.co/kgs/mCVQ4x

comments.author: Htoleco
comments.body: Search the thematic sites and forums, there are many compilations

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Some Religious films that I can suggest to you is The Ten Commandments with Charlton Heston.Ben-Hur with Charlton Heston.Schindler's List with Liam Neeson.Mary, Mother of Jesus with  Christian Bale.Sister Act with Whoopi Goldberg.The Bible with Keith David.

comments.author: Raceonsucced
comments.body: Children of heaven and the message

comments.author: vleroybrown
comments.body: https://youtube.com/@BookofMormonVideosOf paramount importance to residents of the Americas. The Book of Mormon is another record of Jesus Christ and his people, from the history of the people in America.I've never watched these videos, although I find reading often to be preferable. I study and read the BOM, often daily.

comments.author: Wolfblood200$
comments.body: The war room  , is very inspiring and informative  , it tells you the best way to fight your battles is through prayers  , it tells you whose your real enemy  , go watch it and thank me later.

comments.body: Watch Trance movie. Then you will relaize what is true religions mean.
